name: Kwan-Liu Ma
content: Kwan-Liu Ma Distinguished Professor, Computer Science Director, UC Davis Center for Visualization Head, VIDI Labs Faculty of GGCS, GGE, and ECEGP University of California at Davis News I am a keynote speaker of IEEE LDAV 2025. I am a keynote speaker of ChinaVis 2025. My former students Takanori Fujiwara and Sandra Bae will start their faculty positions at the University of Arizona in August 2025. Congratulations to Xiwei Xuan, who received our College's Excellence in Graduate Student Research Award (5/2025). Congratulations to my students David Bauer (3/2025), Qi Wu (6/2024), and Yiran Li (6/2024), who completed their PhD studies. I gave a keynote at the 2025 Visual Computing Trends Symposium (1/2025). My former student, Xiaoyu Zhang, started a faculty position at the City University of Hong Kong (8/2024). I am honored to be elected 2023 ACM Fellow. (1/24/2024) I am honored to receive the 2023 College of Engineering Outstanding Senior Career Research Faculty Award.
